subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In an attempt to get the slumping David Wright better pitches to hit, Manager Willie Randolph bumped Paul Lo Duca to seventh and put Wright between José Reyes and Carlos Beltrán.
snippet: In an attempt to get the slumping David Wright better pitches to hit, Manager Willie Randolph bumped Paul Lo Duca to seventh and put Wright between José Reyes and Carlos Beltrán.
